content.question: A carbon-<math alttext="14" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>14</mn></math> nucleus spontaneously emits a beta <math alttext="beta minus" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msup><mi>β</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math> particle. During this process, the number of which of the following nucleons, if any, will change?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
